trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>事件时的更新按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 在控件内单击时，之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件更新记录。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as HTML-encoding the values of a record before updating it in the data source, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这允许您提供的事件处理程序执行的自定义的例程，如 HTML 编码之前更新数据源中发生此事件时的某个记录的值。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventHandler>委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventHandler>委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。
